required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Study to Evaluate the Safety, Tolerate, Pharmacokinetics and Preliminary Efficacy of CYH33
clinical_study.official_title: A Multi-center, Open-label, Single Arm, Dose Escalation and Dose Extension Phase 1 Study to Evaluate the Safety , Tolerability, Pharmacokinetics and Preliminary Efficacy of CYH33 in Advanced Solid Tumors Patients, and to Evaluate the Safety and Preliminary Efficacy in Advanced Esophagus Canver and Squamous Cell Carcinoma of the Esophageal Junction Patients

brief_summary.textblock: This study is a Multi-center, Open-label, single arm, Dose Escalation and Dose Extension Phase 1 Study to Evaluate the Safety , Tolerability, Pharmacokinetics and Preliminary Efficacy of CYH33 in Advanced Solid Tumors Patients, and to Evaluate the Safety and Preliminary Efficacy in Advanced esophagus canver and Squamous cell carcinoma of the esophageal junction patients

primary_outcome.description: To evaluate the MTD in patients with advanced solid tumor

clinical_study.condition: Advanced Esophagus Cancer and Squamous Cell Carcinoma of the Esophageal Junction

arm_group.description: To determine the maximum tolerated dose (MTD) of CYH33

intervention.description: 1mg; 5mg; 10mg; 20mg; 30mg; 50mg; 75mg; 100mg; 130mg; 160mg; 200mg; 240mgBID or QD(Decided by SMC accroding to the safty and PK data)
